scripts.debugbuild: cd android/app && rm -rf build && cd ../.. && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.debugbuildW: cd android/app && if exist build rmdir /s /q build && cd ../.. && cd android && call gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && call gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.releasebuild: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && ./gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.releasebuildW: cd android/app && if exist build rmdir /s /q build && cd ../.. && cd android && call gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res && cd android && call gradlew assembleRelease
scripts.release: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false  --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res/ && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf ./android/app/src/main/res/raw/ && cd ./android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
scripts.gradleClean: cd android/app && rm -rf build && cd ../.. && cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd ..
scripts.build:production: npm run remove-console-logs && npm run releasebuildW
